column2: "Na David kaan nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no
column3: na ɔdze mpem do asafohemfo na ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo sisii hɔn do."
ɔdze ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor hyɛɛ Joab nsa
column4: na ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor so hyɛɛ Zeruia ne ba Abishai
column5: Joab no nua no nsa
column6: na ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor so hyɛɛ Itai
column7: Gitinyi no nsa. Na ɔhen no see nkorɔfo no dɛ
column8: Ampa emi mara so menye hom rifir edzi akɔ."

column3: Ɔwo mma mmfir edzi nnkɔ: osiandɛ sɛ yeguan a
column4: wɔronndwen hɛn ho; nkyii so sɛ hɛn mu fa totɔr a
column5: wɔronndwen hɛn ho: naaso ɔwo dze
column6: etse dɛ hɛn mu ɔpedu: dɛm ntsi afei oye dɛ ebɛyɛ krado efi kurow no mu abɔboa hɛn."

column3: Dza oye wɔ hom enyi do no
column4: mebɛyɛ. Na ɔhen no gyinaa kuropon nkyɛn
column5: na ɔman no nyinara puei kɔr no ɔha ɔha mu

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ Joab na Abishai na Itai
column3: dɛ
column4: Hom nye aberantsɛ no ndzi no berɛww wɔ me ntsi
column5: mekyerɛ Absalom a. Na aber a ɔhen no rehyɛ asafohemfo no nyinara mbra wɔ Absalom ho no

column2: "Na ɔman no fiir edzi kɔr haban mu kehyiaa Israel: na ɔko no wɔkoo no Efraim kwaa mu."
"Na David no dɔm no bɔɔ Israel ɔman no gui
column3: na okum kɛse sii hɔ da no
column4: na ɔfaa nyimpa mpemeduonu."

column2: "Na ɔko no mu tserɛwee wɔ hɔ kataa asaase no nyinara enyi: na kwaa no sɛɛ nyimpa dodow da no seen hɔn a afona sɛɛ hɔn."
"Na Absalom hyiaa David no nkowaa no awerɛfir mu. Nna Absalom tse n’asoasopɔnkɔ do
column3: na asoasopɔnkɔ no dze kɛfaa esudur kɛse bi n’abaw kusuww ase
column4: na ne tsir kɛhyɛɛ esudur no mu
column5: ma wɔmaa no do ma ɔsensɛɛn ɔsor na asaase ntamu; na asoasopɔnkɔ a ɔwɔ n’ase no nam do kɔree."

column3: na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Joab see dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: muhun Absalom dɛ ɔsɛn esudur mu."

column2: "Na Joab see ɔbarimba no a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no no dɛ
column3: Na
column4: hwɛ
column5: ɔwoara ihunii
column6: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ammbɔ no hɔ annhwe famu? Nkyɛ mebɛma wo dwetɛbona du na abɔdo."

column3: Sɛ mibenya dwetɛbona apem mpo wɔ me nsamu a
column4: nkyɛ mennkɛtsen me nsa maka ɔhen ne ba no: na hɛn asomu na ɔhen hyɛɛ ɔwo na Abishai na Itai mbra
column5: dɛ
column6: Hom nhwɛ yie ma obiara annka aberantsɛ Absalom no."

column2: "Anaaso sɛ mutwa no nkwa ho nkontompɔ a (na asɛm biara nnyi hɔ a osuma ɔhen)
column3: ɔnodze nkyɛ ɔwo kor yi ara ebɔtwe woho ekegyina nkyɛn."
Minnkekyinkyim wo ho dɛm. Na ɔfaa mpeaa ebiasa kitsaa ne nsamu
column4: na ɔtowee hwiraa Absalom n’akoma mu
column5: aber a nkwa da ho wɔ no mu wɔ esudur no mu no."

column2: "Na mberantsɛ du a wɔso Joab n’akodze no twaa ho hyiae na wɔbobɔɔ Absalom kum no."

column3: na nkorɔfo no gyaa Israel tsiw sanee: osiandɛ Joab twee nkorɔfo no ekyir."

column2: "Na woyii Absalom kɔtoow no kyeen kwaa no mu mona kɛse bi mu
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ abo isiw kɛsenara wɔ no do: na Israel nyinara guanee obiara kɔr n’asesee mu."

column2: "Na Absalom tse ase no osii nkaadum bi a ɔwɔ ɔhen no bɔn mu no dze maa noho: na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Minnyi babanyin a wɔdze no bɛkaa me dzin: na ɔdze nankasa ne dzin too dum no: na wɔfrɛɛ no Absalom ne nkaadum
column4: dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column3: Zadok ba no see dɛ
column4: Afei ma muntu mbirika monkɔbɔ ɔhen amandzɛɛ
column5: mbrɛ EWURADZE esi na oedzi n’atamfo wer ama no."

column3: Mma ɔwo nnyɛ amandzɛɛbɔfo ndɛ da yi
column4: mbom ebɔbɔ amandzɛɛ da bi: na ndɛ da yi dze mma nnkɔbɔ amandzɛɛ
column5: osiandɛ ɔhen ne ba atɔr."

column3: Kɔ kɛka dza ɔwoara ehu kyerɛ ɔhen. Na Kusnyi no bɔɔ no mu adze maa Joab
column4: na otuu mbirika."

column3: Zadok ba no da ho see Joab bio dɛ
column4: Meserɛ wo
column5: dza ɔbɛba biara mbra
column6: ma mo so muntu mbirika memfa Kusnyi no. Na Joab see dɛ
column8: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na epɛ dɛ itu mbirika yi
column9: hwɛ no dɛ irinnya akatua bi wɔ amandzɛɛ no ntsi yi?"

column3: Dza ɔbɛba biara mbra
column4: mubotu mbirika. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Tu mbirika ɛ. Nna Ahimaaz tuu mbirika dze faa Tɛtɛrmu kwan no do

column2: "Na David tse nkuropon ebien no ntamu: na ɔweɔmfo no fowee kɔr kuropon nkurii no do wɔ fadum no ho
column3: na ɔmaa n’enyiwa do
column4: na ɔhwɛe
column5: na

column2: "Na ɔweɔmfo no tseaa mu na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no. Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Sɛ nankotoo a nna amandzɛɛ bi wɔ n’anomu. Na ɔdze ba ara
column4: na ɔbɛnee."

column2: "Na ɔweɔmfo no hun ɔbarimba kor so dɛ ɔdze mbirika reba: na ɔweɔmfo no tseaa mu frɛɛ abowanohwɛfo no
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: ɔbarimba kor so nankotoo dze mbirika reba. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column4: Zadok ba no ne mbirikatu. Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column5: Ɔno ɔyɛ nyimpa pa

column3: na ɔsee ɔhen no dɛ
column4: Bɔkɔɔ. Na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ ɔhen no enyim dze n’enyim boom famu
column5: na ɔsee dɛ Nhyira nka EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a oeyi nyimpa a wɔma hɔn nsa do tsia mo wura ɔhen no ama."

column3: Ana aberantsɛ Absalom no ho ye? Na Ahimaaz buaa dɛ

column4: gyina ha. Na ɔdaan noho kegyinaa dzinn."

column6: amandzɛɛ nye yi. EWURADZE edzi hɔn a wɔsoɛree tsiaa wo nyinara wer ama wo ndɛ da yi."
